title: Making me redownload the same patch
body:
I've so far downloaded the last patch 2 times in the past week and don't know why it keeps doing this.  Is there a way to fix this so I don't need to redl it again, or a way to prevent it for future?  I have really slow internet so this is extremely annoying having to dl it over and over.

  proof of me already having it downloaded https://gyazo.com/6a27f303712bad90a3abe54ecff7b179 

and it making me dl again https://gyazo.com/71edbe2d3ab5bf37eb2ddb672b74156b

Edit: Update, it downloaded but keeps going past the full download length now.. wtf? https://gyazo.com/65c638523e97c82bc67664a6d7e83963

replies.body:
Hmmmm if you had already downloaded that patch once (or more) times, then it sounds like your client must have noticed that some of the files didn't get installed perfectly. This is the clients attempt to redownload that patch in order to prevent you from having any kind of random crashes. 

It's best to let that download finish up, but if it pops up like every time then go ahead and grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and try running a quick **force repatch**. Let me know if that helps!
Alrighty, for now it's doing good. Thanks for reply :)
